nodes.text: This mission was undertaken by Ahsoka Tano during the Clone Wars.
Onboard Republic flagship the Resolute, Ahsoka Tano received a distress signal from Tatooine. Determined to prove herself as Jedi, Ahsoka took a Nu-class attack shuttle and departed to investigate.

Upon her arrival on Tatooine, Ahsoka's shuttle's signal was jammed by the Separatists. Near Jabba's Palace, Ahsoka was attacked by battle droids. Meanwhile on the Resolute, Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi and clone trooper captain CC-7567, nicknamed "Rex" lost shuttle's signal. They realized that the distress signal was fake and Ahsoka has fallen directly into a Separatist trap. Anakin and Obi-Wan took the Twilight, a G9 Rigger-class light freighter and rushed to the rescue. When they reached Tatoo system, Ahsoka managed to comm her master and explained the situation to him. The Twilight was attacked by a squadron of Vulture droids but won this dogfight and successfully landed on Tatooine. The Jedi destroyed all droids.
When the droids were defeated, Anakin told Ahsoka that it was Count Dooku's trap. Ahsoka apologized for her foolishness and promised not to go it alone again.
The mission's first and only appearance was in the children's 3D adventure book The Clone Wars: Journey Through Hyperspace, based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series.
